description: T1 Mature Oak at block 19-27. Lateral reduction from building by up to 2m.T2 Mature Oak at block 10-18. Lateral reduction from building by up to 2m.T3 Young Oak adjacent to wall crown reduce by 2m and reshape.T4 Poplar located at the corner of Fountain Drive and Crystal Palace parade. Fell, tree is impacting on the boundary wall.T5 Poplar. Poor specimen. Remove as part of good arboricultural management.T6 Poplar. Poor specimen. Remove as part of good arboricultural management.T7 Poplar. Poor specimen. Remove as part of good arboricultural management.T8 Sycamore. Lift to 5m off the highway.G1 Poplar /London Plane. Lateral reduction over roadside by up to 5m to rebalance crown and counter photropic lean. Cuts to suitable branch junctions where possible.G2 All self seeded Sycamore and Ash saplings to 100mm. Remove. General maintenance.
